founder.name: Oscar Trelles
founder.bio:
Oscar blends breathwork, the Wim Hof Method, systemic coaching, and performance frameworks to help clients reset their nervous system, make clear decisions, and sustain meaningful change.

His work ranges from 1:1 coaching to organizational workshops and retreats.

story.title: Our Story
story.body:
Breathing Flame exists to help humans perform better and live better, and without burning out.

We combine evidence-based methods with immersive experiences to build resilience, reveal clarity, and create lasting transformation for individuals and organizations.

posts.title: The Science of Breathwork: How Conscious Breathing Transforms Your Body and Mind

author.bio: Breathing Flame Lead Researcher and Certified Breathwork Instructor
author.name: Dr. Sarah Martinez

posts.content:
# The Science of Breathwork

Breathwork isn't just a wellness trend—it's a scientifically-backed practice that can fundamentally change how your body and mind function. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the research behind conscious breathing and its profound effects on your health and performance.

## The Physiology of Breathing

When you breathe consciously, you're not just taking in oxygen. You're activating the autonomic nervous system, specifically the parasympathetic nervous system, which is responsible for rest, recovery, and healing.

### Key Physiological Changes

- **Heart Rate Variability (HRV)**: Conscious breathing increases HRV, a key marker of cardiovascular health and stress resilience
- **Cortisol Reduction**: Studies show that breathwork can reduce cortisol levels by up to 40%
- **Immune Function**: Deep breathing stimulates the lymphatic system and enhances immune response
- **Neuroplasticity**: Regular practice can literally rewire your brain for better emotional regulation

## The Wim Hof Method: A Case Study

The Wim Hof Method combines breathing techniques with cold exposure and meditation. Research has shown that practitioners can:

- Control their immune response
- Increase brown fat production
- Improve focus and mental clarity
- Reduce inflammation markers

## Practical Applications

### For Stress Management
- 4-7-8 breathing technique
- Box breathing for anxiety
- Coherent breathing for emotional balance

### For Performance
- Power breathing before workouts
- Recovery breathing between sets
- Focus breathing for mental clarity

## Getting Started

Begin with just 5 minutes of conscious breathing daily. Focus on:

1. **Diaphragmatic breathing**: Breathe into your belly, not your chest
2. **Extended exhales**: Make your exhale longer than your inhale
3. **Consistency**: Practice at the same time each day

The science is clear: breathwork is one of the most powerful tools we have for optimizing our physical and mental health. Start small, stay consistent, and watch as your life transforms one breath at a time.
posts.excerpt: Discover the physiological and psychological benefits of breathwork practices and how they can enhance your performance, reduce stress, and improve overall wellbeing.

seo.metaDescription: Discover the scientific research behind breathwork practices and how conscious breathing can enhance your performance, reduce stress, and improve wellbeing.
seo.metaTitle: The Science of Breathwork: Transform Your Body and Mind

posts.content:
# Building Resilience Through Cold Therapy

Cold therapy, also known as cold exposure or cryotherapy, is one of the most powerful tools for building both mental and physical resilience. When practiced safely and consistently, it can transform your relationship with stress and discomfort.

## The Science of Cold Adaptation

Cold exposure triggers a cascade of physiological responses designed to protect and strengthen your body:

### Immediate Effects
- **Vasoconstriction**: Blood vessels constrict to preserve core temperature
- **Increased Heart Rate**: Your heart works harder to maintain circulation
- **Release of Stress Hormones**: Adrenaline and noradrenaline surge through your system

### Long-term Adaptations
- **Brown Fat Activation**: Cold exposure increases brown adipose tissue, which burns calories to generate heat
- **Improved Circulation**: Regular cold exposure strengthens your cardiovascular system
- **Enhanced Immune Function**: Cold therapy can boost your immune response and reduce inflammation

## Mental Resilience Benefits

The mental benefits of cold therapy are perhaps even more profound than the physical ones:

- **Stress Inoculation**: Regular exposure to controlled stress builds your capacity to handle life's challenges
- **Mental Toughness**: Learning to stay calm in uncomfortable situations transfers to all areas of life
- **Emotional Regulation**: Cold therapy can help you develop better control over your emotional responses

## Getting Started Safely

### Beginner Protocol
1. **Start with cold showers**: Begin with 30 seconds of cold water at the end of your regular shower
2. **Gradually increase duration**: Add 10-15 seconds each week
3. **Focus on your breathing**: Use breathwork techniques to stay calm and centered
4. **Listen to your body**: Never push beyond your comfort zone too quickly

### Intermediate Practices
- **Ice baths**: 2-5 minutes in water between 50-60°F
- **Cold plunges**: Natural bodies of water when available
- **Cryotherapy chambers**: Professional cold therapy sessions

## Safety Considerations

Always consult with a healthcare provider before starting cold therapy, especially if you have:
- Cardiovascular conditions
- High blood pressure
- Raynaud's disease
- Pregnancy

## The Wim Hof Method Integration

Combining cold therapy with the Wim Hof breathing method can amplify the benefits:

1. **Preparation breathing**: 3-4 rounds of power breathing
2. **Cold exposure**: Start with 1-2 minutes
3. **Recovery breathing**: Focus on slow, deep breaths
4. **Reflection**: Notice how you feel physically and mentally

## Building Your Practice

### Week 1-2: Foundation
- Cold showers: 30-60 seconds
- Focus on breathing and staying calm
- Document your experience

### Week 3-4: Progression
- Cold showers: 1-2 minutes
- Add ice to your bath water
- Practice in different environments

### Month 2+: Mastery
- Ice baths: 2-5 minutes
- Cold water swimming
- Advanced breathing techniques

## The Transformation

After 30 days of consistent practice, you'll notice:

- **Improved sleep quality**
- **Enhanced mood and energy**
- **Better stress management**
- **Increased confidence**
- **Stronger immune system**

Cold therapy isn't about being tough—it's about learning to be comfortable with discomfort. This skill transfers to every area of your life, making you more resilient, confident, and capable of handling whatever challenges come your way.

Start small, stay consistent, and watch as your relationship with stress transforms.

posts.title: Building Resilience Through Cold Therapy: A Complete Guide

posts.excerpt: Discover practical mindfulness techniques designed for busy professionals who need effective stress management and mental clarity without adding more to their already packed schedules.
posts.content:
# Mindfulness for Busy Professionals

In today's fast-paced world, finding time for mindfulness can feel like just another item on an endless to-do list. But what if I told you that effective mindfulness doesn't require hours of meditation or a complete lifestyle overhaul?

## The 5-Minute Rule

The key to sustainable mindfulness for busy professionals is the 5-minute rule: start with just 5 minutes daily. This approach is:

- **Achievable**: Anyone can find 5 minutes
- **Sustainable**: Builds a habit without overwhelming your schedule
- **Effective**: Even short practices create measurable benefits

## Micro-Mindfulness Techniques

### 1. The Breathing Space (2-3 minutes)
Perfect for between meetings or during transitions:

1. **Stop**: Pause whatever you're doing
2. **Breathe**: Take 3 deep, conscious breaths
3. **Notice**: Observe your thoughts, emotions, and physical sensations
4. **Choose**: Decide how you want to respond to the next moment

### 2. The Mindful Minute (1 minute)
Use this during any brief pause:

- Set a timer for 60 seconds
- Focus entirely on your breath
- When your mind wanders, gently return to breathing
- Notice the quality of your attention

### 3. Walking Meditation (5 minutes)
Transform your daily walks into mindfulness practice:

- Walk at a natural pace
- Focus on the sensation of your feet touching the ground
- Notice the rhythm of your steps
- Observe your surroundings without judgment

## Desk-Based Practices

### The 4-7-8 Breathing Technique
Ideal for stress management at your desk:

1. Inhale for 4 counts
2. Hold for 7 counts
3. Exhale for 8 counts
4. Repeat 4 times

### The Body Scan (3-5 minutes)
A quick check-in with your body:

1. Start at the top of your head
2. Slowly scan down through your body
3. Notice any tension or discomfort
4. Breathe into areas of tension
5. End at your feet

## Technology-Assisted Mindfulness

### Apps for Busy Professionals
- **Headspace**: Short, guided meditations
- **Calm**: Quick stress-relief sessions
- **Insight Timer**: Free, customizable timers
- **Ten Percent Happier**: Practical, science-based approach

### Smartphone Reminders
- Set hourly breathing reminders
- Use calendar alerts for mindfulness breaks
- Create a "mindfulness" folder with quick practices

## The Science Behind Micro-Practices

Research shows that even brief mindfulness practices can:

- **Reduce cortisol levels** by up to 25%
- **Improve focus and attention** within 2 weeks
- **Enhance emotional regulation** in high-stress situations
- **Boost immune function** with regular practice

## Creating Your Practice

### Week 1: Foundation
- Choose one technique
- Practice for 5 minutes daily
- Set a specific time and place
- Track your consistency

### Week 2: Expansion
- Add a second technique
- Practice at different times of day
- Notice patterns in your stress levels
- Adjust your approach as needed

### Week 3: Integration
- Combine techniques
- Practice during transitions
- Use mindfulness in challenging situations
- Share your experience with others

### Week 4: Mastery
- Develop your own micro-practices
- Teach others what you've learned
- Create a sustainable routine
- Celebrate your progress

## Common Challenges and Solutions

### "I don't have time"
**Solution**: Start with 1-minute practices. You have time for one minute.

### "My mind won't stop racing"
**Solution**: That's normal. The goal isn't to stop thoughts—it's to notice them without judgment.

### "I keep forgetting to practice"
**Solution**: Set specific triggers (after coffee, before lunch, etc.) and use reminders.

### "I don't feel any different"
**Solution**: Give it 2 weeks. The benefits are cumulative and often subtle at first.

## The Ripple Effect

As you develop your mindfulness practice, you'll notice changes in:

- **Decision-making**: More thoughtful, less reactive
- **Relationships**: Better listening, more empathy
- **Performance**: Improved focus, reduced errors
- **Wellbeing**: Less stress, more satisfaction

## Your Next Steps

1. **Choose one technique** from this article
2. **Set a 5-minute timer** for tomorrow
3. **Practice consistently** for one week
4. **Notice the changes** in your daily experience
5. **Share your success** with your team or colleagues

Remember: mindfulness isn't about perfection—it's about presence. Even 5 minutes of imperfect practice is better than no practice at all.

Start today. Your future self will thank you.

seo.metaDescription: Discover practical mindfulness techniques for busy professionals. Learn 5-minute practices that reduce stress and improve focus without overwhelming your schedule.

posts.title: Mindfulness for Busy Professionals: 5-Minute Practices That Actually Work

testimonials.text: Mi experiencia en su taller ha sido muy expansiva, sintiéndome sostenida, guiada, pensé que no iba a poder entrar en el hielo, hasta que lo logré y se sintió liberador, muy agradecida con Óscar por su guía y profesionalidad.🙏🙏🙏

La experiencia de este taller fue súper bonita y muy significativa para mí, un paso para inmergirme en las profundidades de mí misma y superar mis miedos, Oscar tienen muy buena energía y me hizo sentir cómoda todo el tiempo, y sus asistentes también, han habido también momentos muy divertidos con el grupo, fue todo muy especial!

Fue una experiencia mágica y maravillosa, hicimos wim Hof mi pareja y yo en una ocasión especial ella estaba de cumpleaños y fue muy muy enriquecedora y desafiante, nos encantó. Oscar me pareció una persona muy profesional y apasionada por birndarnos esta experiencia personalizada en la playa… simplemente muchísima gracias a Oscar y a su asistente por su atención

Cuando superas un obstáculo, una barrera, una idea, una creencia, un pensamiento… la sensación que sientes es que ¡quieres más!. Una preparación perfecta de la mano de Óscar para disfrutar de esta técnica y su potencial.
It was amazing experience for me!Thank you very much Oscar for yesterday 🙏

Oscar provided a really great and life changing experience. Throughout the experience I felt safe and in confident hands. He really knows his stuff! Definitely will repeat. The location was really nice in Respira Yoga Tarifa and the views were amazing. Thanks Oscar for this great experience.

Excellent introduction to the Wim Hof experience! Oscar explained the logic behind the Wim Hof method, then took us through some very relaxing breathing exercises whilst lying down. Finally we had the immersion experience in about 6 degrees water. Amazingly I did not feel too uncomfortable with the coldness but I felt a good sense of relaxation after the dip! I will certainly attend his next workshop as I sense the Method can relax and energize me. Muchas gracias Oscar!
I had great introductory session to the WHM breathing technique followed by an ice bath. After the workshop I felt very calm and energized. Thank you Oscar!

Ha sido una experiencia genial de sábado por la mañana! Comenzar el día controlando la mente, la respiración y vencer retos es de lo mejor que nos podemos regalar como seres humanos🙏✨ Óscar es un instructor super amable, atento y con mucha empatía y gracia para acompañar en el proceso! Estoy pendiente de su grupo de prácticas para que todas las semanas podamos practicar! 🤗🧊🧊🧊❄️

Amazing experience of breathwork and ice bath together. Oscar is really professional at the work what he does. I’m really glad that I have found this breathwork and will go for it again for sure. 110% I will recommend this breathwork and ice bath workshop! Thank you Oscar! 🙏🏽✨
Really enjoyed the class, very informative and well explained. I had my scepticisms about breath work going into it, but it was legitimately mind blowing. Definitely recommend it.
Amazing experience, Oscar is a fantastic instructor, who creates memorable and engaging breathwork experiences.

First time doing this. I’ve been exploring these types of events the past couple years to better understand and connect with myself on a deeper level. Let’s just say for being a first time with breathing excersides I had a really great experience and was able to do everything with ease thanks to the instruction of Oscar. I had met Oscar a few days prior and just by the short conversation we had and the energy that he transmits i knew I had met someone special. Besides that, the location is perfect, comfortable and with very cool hand painted interior…goes well with the theme of the event. Thanks again Oscar

I had a beautiful experience attending a 9D breathwork session in Málaga. The use of headphones created a deeply intimate and immersive environment even though we were within a group setting. The combination of guided breathwork, carefully curated music tracks, and a grounding meditation at the end made the session incredibly introspective and powerful. It allowed me to reconnect with myself and tap into something much greater. I’m truly grateful for the opportunity to participate, and I hope more people find their way to this work, especially parents in need of a reset, professionals managing high levels of stress, or anyone simply looking to reconnect and realign. Highly recommended. Thank you for holding such a transformative space.

Attending a Wim Hof Method session with Oscar was truly transformative. His deep knowledge and genuine passion for the practice created an environment that was both educational and empowering. Oscar's guidance through the breathing exercises and cold exposure techniques was clear and supportive, making the experience accessible even for beginners. His calm demeanor and encouragement helped me push past my perceived limits and discover a newfound resilience within myself. I left the session feeling invigorated, centered, and with tools I can incorporate into my daily routine. Highly recommend Oscar to anyone looking to explore the Wim Hof Method in a safe and inspiring setting.

Una sesión excelente, había hecho varios Breathwork y me había dado baños de agua fría pero como con Óscar nada. Además me gustó mucho sus explicaciones. 10/10, recomendado 100%. Excelente persona y profesional.

Ha sido una experiencia supero chula y he aprendido un montón con Óscar y todas las preguntas han sido respondidas a la perfección y con un acompañamiento muy bueno cuando nos teníamos que meter en el agua congelada. He conocido también a gente maravillosa.
A great experience with a great group of people...something I'll for sure be doing again.

Since the first moment I met Oscar, I got the impression that he was responsible, centred and knowledgeable. Everything he does, he does it very thoroughly and puts all his energy into it. He does Wim Hof method in my studio and our collaboration just flows since the beginning. I can't wait to try his 9D Breathwork, which I am sure he'll do perfectly as he does the Wim Hof Method.

Asistí a una mañana de respiración y exposición al frío con Óscar y la experiencia fue increíble. Me sentí muy integrada en el grupo que se creó, a pesar de no conocernos de nada. Óscar tiene una energía tranquila, cercana y a la vez muy clara al guiar. Fue mi primera vez y me sentí segura en todo momento. Gracias por sostener ese espacio tan especial 💛. ¡Repetiría sin duda!
Very nice experience! thank you so much
Hicimos una terapia de respiración consciente terminando en baño de hielo que me gustó muchísimo. Gracias

El sábado tuve unas de las mejores experiencias que he tenido la oportunidad de vivir y fue de la mano de Óscar, organizandor, gran profesor y guía que nos introdujo de una manera increíble al método Win Hof y sus fundamentos. Durante toda la practica sentí una seguridad y tranquilidad asombrosas que se tradujo en un energía y experiencia irrepetible ( aunque espero repetir). Solamente dar las gracias a Óscar, a mí acompañeros y compañeras y a Respira por traernos iniciativas tan maravillosas. Si estás pensado iniciarte en el método, sinceramente, Breathing Frame con Óscar a la cabeza siento que es la mejor opción. Gracias!

Oscar is a true talent in the marketing and advertising industries. His outlook on the ever-evolving digital landscape combined with his ability to simplify complexity makes him a trusted adviser to marketers at all levels. And when it comes to execution, Oscar is able to leverage his years of hands-on technical experience to set teams up for success from the start — ensuring that everyone involved understands the big picture while striving to deliver a specific campaign or project. It's for these reasons that I can't wait to work with Oscar again.

Oscar is simply an outstanding individual. He is an agile character able to keep up with the demanding pace and schedule. On top of having the patience and grace to deal with the multiple hats he has been given. It has been a pleasure working with Oscar. I would recommend him to anyone.

Since i met Oscar back in 2005, he has always been on the forefront of technology. His particular affinity for flash enables him to creatively architect everything from micro-sites to large flex applications..which is why i partnered and consulted with him over the years. His 'can do' attitude, and keen hands-on experience which he brings to any challenge makes him an ideal technology leader for any team. I look forward to working with him in the future.. On a personal note, our close partnership has grown into a friendship i am very grateful for..he's a funny, wonderful human being and an amazing dad.

Ive had the pleasure of working with Oscar on many creative and technically challenging web projects.. and in every case, Oscar has consistently shown a unique ability in technical execution, industry acumen, and creative thinking that is rarely found in 1 person. His plethora of skills speak for themselves. With amazing strengths in ActionScript Development, Creative OOP Architecture, IA, Usability, and Interaction Design. Whoever works with him will walk enlightened.

author.name: Christopher Smith
author.title: Sr Product Designer | AI tools, Design Systems, Strategy, Leadership, UX Engineer

testimonials.text: Oscar is one of the most intelligent, business minded, and funny people I've ever met. His attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple tasks of a team based environment are fantastic. Any time I had a question that required more experienced knowledge than my own senior ability or just wanted to talk about anything including beer induced life stories, Oscar was there to lend a hand. Great working with and knowing this guy!

It was great pleasure to work with Oscar during my time at Domani Studios. As Director of Technology he continually pushed the level of innovation and was always a great pleasure to work with. I hope we get to work together again one day.

author.title: Pitmaster & Owner, Fletcher's BBQ Shop & Steakhouse
author.name: Bill Fletcher

testimonials.text: There is a lot to say about Oscar, and its all good. First and foremost, Oscar is one of the most dedicated and tireless employees I ever hired in 10 years running Domani Studios, an award-winning digital advertising agency. He came aboard as a senior developer, and quickly proved his value working under hectic deadlines for a client who constantly moved the target. Within a year he was promoted to Director of Flash Development, leading our deep team of flash developers. And within a year of that promotion Oscar took the helm of the tech department entirely as Technology Director. It was a quick ascent, and well deserved. Oscar's range of technical knowledge is broad, and he has an uncanny ability to stay in the trenches of day-to-day development production methods while simultaneously absorbing the newest of technologies. His ability to walk a client through a technical hurdle or best-practice approach is outstanding, and his ability to rally a team of exhausted developers was a critical facet of our organization. I could easily outline dozens of instances Oscar either saved the day or preemptively steered the team clear of danger, but I think its best to simply say he is one of perhaps three employees I have hired that I would trust with absolutely anything, technical in nature or not. His integrity is bullet-proof, his work-ethic is flawless, and his loyalty is all that an owner could ever hope for. If you have the chance to work with Oscar, I'd jump on it.

Oscar is a guru in the interactive community. Period. What's really astounding though, is that this isn't the most memorable part of working with Oscar. He brings to the table a rare combination of supreme capability, confidence and humility that essentially removes the issue of technological limitations from any creative endeavor. It just always seemed so easy to make anything we wanted a reality. This freed me up to ask any silly technological question I wanted, which Oscar always happily answered.

Oscar has some sort of magical power. Every time I found myself with some kind of unfathomable bug in my code, I would ask Oscar for help. And literally every time he came over to my desk to see what the problem could be, the bug would just disappear without explanation. I think Oscar just radiates genius. And in addition to his loads of experience and expertise, he is also a great, friendly person. Working with him was always fun and stress-free.

Oscar is a human technologist. It was way before that we first met in person that i heard about him as one of the most talented Latin Flash developers, kind of unreachable because he wasn't around Flash-related forums and was already living in the US. Though, from time to time he travelled to less-developed countries to share his knowledge with local developer communities, and that's how we first shared some emails. I found out that he is a genuine caring and thankful human being, worried about learning as much as he is about sharing what he learns, in order to get better (for himself and for the people surrounding him). So it's not only that he's doing some stunning work at one of the top digital shops in the world, but also the feeling that spending some time working with him will make you (much) better at work, and a better and (probably) more humble person.

author.title: Former Director of Technology at Marquette University Law School and Current Owner, Simple Comfort Food
author.name: Dax Phillips

testimonials.text: I worked with Oscar on the technical redesign of Marquette University Law School's website which included custom modules that integrated with Drupal and our enterprise services. From the moment I met Oscar, my team was confident that Oscar not only understood our needs, but we knew he would deliver a great site. Oscar's leadership role kept the project on time even though we were dealing with multiple stakeholders within the university. Oscar never flinched at any of our ideas or concepts when we began discussing our needs, and better yet, he led his team to take those ideas and turn them into realities. It was a real privilege working with Oscar and I hope that we cross paths in the future.
Innovative, resourceful, dynamic personality

author.name: Danny Raul Siancas
author.title: Co-Founder, Director IT at Urban Golem Media Development

author.name: Fran Devinney
author.title: Senior Engineering Manager at Condé Nast

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Oscar for close to three years. He was a very unique boss, one that you could approach easily with any problem. He has this huge, seemingly limitless knowledge for all things digital, and was able to offer guidance and solutions to any problem. Oscar is both a technically sound developer and a great group director.

Oscar is THAT guy. Talk to him and you'll understand. I had the pleasure for working with Oscar during my time at Domani Studios in sunny Brooklyn, New York. I unfortunately didn't have the pleasure of working with him enough, being that I sat on the other side of the aisle. Incredibly chill and modest and with a killer sense of humor, Oscar illustrated to me that he was one of the sharpest guys in the business, hands down. It's really an honor and a privilege that I can review Mr. Trelles.

author.name: Peter Guarino
author.title: Omnichannel Marketing | Digital Strategy | Full Funnel Activation | Creative Content Delivery

testimonials.text: Oscar Trelles is a very knowledgeable man. Through his dedication, patience and leadership, he increases the knowledge of those around him and serves as not only a colleague, but a teacher. Oscar was the Technology Director during my formative years as a Producer. There was a lot that I did not know (I'm still not all there), however whenever I had a question or was in a client-facing jam, Oscar was always available for a quick consult or technical intervention. Whether the problem was best solved by a rough sketch or via an illustrative metaphor, we always seemed to work through the issue at hand and define an appropriate solution to the problem. You haven't lived until you've somehow likened Ruby on Rails and Mongrels to dating and marriage. It goes without saying that Oscar is an incredibly talented 'tech guy.' He just flat-out knows seemingly everything about what it takes to develop best in class applications for the web. When you combine his depth of knowledge and ability to lead and manage with his positive attitude and friendly demeanor, you've got a TD who can handle any technical or non-technical issue that comes his way. When all else fails, just hand the guy a Grande bold. - he'll do whatever you ask...

author.title: Freelance Front End Developer/UX Designer/ Creative Technologist / Veeva / Vue/Vuex / ReactJS / Gatsby / Nuxt
author.name: iisha small

testimonials.text: Oscar Trelles is an excellent Flash Developer. His extensive knowledge of Actionscript, PHP, MySQL and how to combine all of these helped to streamline our registration forms and floorplan databases. He was great to work with.

Oscar has a certain manner of ease that makes his job look easy... He maintains such a high level of behind the scenes support, you begin to take it for granted as things move smoothly along. I always had tremendous respect for Oscar's style of management and his vast experiential tool set as a lead developer, but it wasn't until I left Domani and started contracting for numerous other studios (large and small) that I realized just how much he contributed to the inner-workings of the entire studio as Technology Director... From his adept ability to build a development team (that was the most talented and laid-back i've encountered) to building a tech infrastructure and automated support system which streamlines daily workflow making everyones' job easier and more efficient (from developer to producer to designer to secretary)... All this and he's also a cool dude to have a beer with... Just can't be beat.

author.title: Product Development & Design | Full Stack Developer | Engineering Manager
author.name: Jason W.

testimonials.text: - Oscar is a highly skilled programmer and a Flash developer. Very knowledgable and willing to help others. - A true leader. A very organized person. Oscar has good sense of design as well.

author.title: Driving Technological Innovation as Tech Lead at VML & Co-Founder at Urban Golem
author.name: Jorge Escribens

testimonials.text: Oscar is a solid professional, reliable and compromised to achieve the best results in each project. His leadership creates a enjoyable environment where each member of the team can develop to the best of it's capacities and motivated to create high quality products and services.

Oscar and I worked on a book entitled 'Flash Video For Professionals.' I wrote some code for the book, and as technical editor, Oscar kept me honest! His recommendations were excellent and resulted in, frankly, better code. In a book of this nature, that's very important! I recommend Oscar highly - he's extremely professional and fun to work with!

During my time at Domani Studios, I came to deeply appreciate Oscar as both a manager and college. His ability to convey deadlines without pressure coupled with his sense of humor help create a great work environment. Oscar is extremely knowledgeable and he is never too busy to answer a question, help trouble shoot an issue or talk through a possible approach to a project. I recommend Oscar without reservation. He is my favorite type of manager, one that helps rather than hinders.

My first impression of Oscar was the load of knowledge he carries in his field. Not only is he well respected by colleagues for his technical expertise. Oscar is also a great leader who brings an ease to his people around. I highly recommend him!

author.title: Senior Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
author.name: Lavinia S.

testimonials.text: While at Domani Studios, it was a pleasure to have Oscar as my manager. Oscar's management approach is one that is hands-on without being overbearing. He allows the people in his team to openly express both their concerns and suggestions on the projects that we worked on, in turn producing great products. In addition, Oscar always makes the time to lend a hand or help troubleshoot an issue, even when he is swamped with his own tasks. Oscar's positive attitude and great sense of humor made my days at Domani Studios enjoyable.

Oscar is highly knowledgeable, thorough, patient and knows Flash inside and out. He went over and above when we needed extra help to meet our incremental deadlines, and never hesitated to fill in the blanks when he felt our code needed tweaking. Always supportive and positive, our book benefited greatly from his involvement.

author.title: Founder CEO @ Quantious | Marketing Enablement | I help the biggest brands in tech bring products to market faster + maximize their marketing budgets. 🌟 Inc Best Workplaces 🌟 Inc 5000 🌟 AdWeek Fastest-Growing 🌟
author.name: Lisa Larson-Kelley

testimonials.text: I worked with Oscar for over four years at Domani Studios. He is a first-rate technical director, programmer, mentor, and forward-thinking technologist. He combines the razor-sharp focus of the best programmers with the broader insight that effective managers possess. I know that my skills as a programmer improved simply by working with him and seeing him solve problems. He is good at identifying and encouraging the intellectual interests of his team, and has a natural feel for finding the best person for the job. As a leader, he's always been willing to fight the tough battles for his team. I offer him my highest recommendation.

From the first time I met Oscar, I was struck by his enthusiasm for new ideas brought to life by technology. He has a calm confidence and optimism for what technology can do, and an ability to suss out problems before they bubble over. I'd love the chance to work with him again.

This man needs no recommendations, he is "The Oscar". If you have ever had the experience of working with him for even a single project, or even just needed advice; it is instantly apparent that this man is one of the best. Although extremely technically minded Oscar has the ability to communicate with simple, friendly language and a great sense of humour.

author.title: Obsessed with UI/UX and user happiness. A front-end engineer looking for his next role to level up and keep fighting for users.
author.name: Nathan Mynarcik

testimonials.text: Oscar is a true leader and someone that can be trusted to provide the care for a team that makes you feel like you are really apart of something. Whatever the team needed to be more productive or to perform the tasks at hand, Oscar delivered. He managed our team very well and knew every aspect of every project. When you needed advice, assistance, or guidance, he was always ready and willing to help. He is a great leader that will lead any team to conquer any task. I am thankful for the opportunity to have worked with him and I feel many will feel the same way in his future.

I had the pleasure of working with Oscar during his tenure as Head of Technology at Tribal DDB. Oscar is the kind of manager you want to work for - he is exceedingly capable from a technical standpoint and is quite adept and seeing "the big picture" when distilling technical problems. But, our industry is filled with solid technicians. What really sets Oscar apart is his ability to combine strong technical leadership with genuine character. He is a team player in every sense of the word. And, he is a joy to work with. Our small technology team here at Tribal was very sorry to see him go. Wherever he decides to invest his energies next, I know they will benefit immensely from his contribution (as we did at Tribal). I enthusiastically recommend Oscar.

author.title: Solutions Architect, Software Energy Impact, & Sustainability
author.name: Peter Dushkin

testimonials.text: Oscar is fantastic department leader, creative technologist, and all around great guy to work with. I couldn't recommend him more highly. During my time at Tribal, he consistently simplified projects from a technical perspective. He's always the most knowledgeable about interactive in general, emerging trends and innovation, and marketing strategy. Not only does he have these qualities, but he is a fantastic partner to producers, PMs, and is a natural leader.

author.title: Creator and co-founder of Metal Injection, the leading online source for heavy metal. Exited in 2022. I am looking for a new challenge to inspire me in the music or pro wrestling pace.
author.name: Robert Pasbani

testimonials.text: Oscar is one of the most well versed computer minds I know. From networking to code development, Oscar knew it all. He was always incredibly personable and offered help when solutions were needed with headache clients. Oscar is somebody I wish I could always have on my team.

author.title: Marketing Strategy | Social Media Strategy + Management | Comms Planning | CX | Digital Strategy | Growth Marketing | eCommerce | Digital Transformation
author.name: Samara Hodgson

testimonials.text: Oscar is a triple threat; he's technically superior, a wonderful communicator and an inspiring leader. He offered security to his team and was always willing to get his hands dirty when necessary. And the best part - he's just a good guy.

Oscar is fabulous to work with and recommend him highly. We have worked on several projects together and the results always exceed expectations. From design to programming he has been an invaluable contributor to our team on all Flash work.

Oscar was the director of flash production during my time at Domani Studios. He was supportive of all the developers and helped me to learn an effective professional approach to actionscript programming.

I have had the pleasure of working with Oscar Trelles for the past year. I can say confidently that I would recommend Oscar highly for any position for which he feels qualified. Oscar has been the key Director when we worked together, and always found solutions for any issues we might have had. I hold Oscar in highest regards.

author.name: Shawn Clarke
author.title: Consultant, Fractional COO, Program Management, Product Management and Production

testimonials.text: I have been in the trenches with Oscar and there is no one I would rather have been with. His expertise and instincts virtually guarantee success. Cool under pressure, clever and fast, there is no end to his toolkit. He is either the most technically able marketer or the most marketing-focused technologist I know.

Oscar worked as an expert reviewer on our book about Flash, "The Flash Anthology: Cool Effects & Practical ActionScript". His work was timely and of good quality, and helped to shape the book's content into a much better product.

author.name: Simon Mackie
author.title: Content Design | Content Operations | Communication | Strategy

testimonials.text: Oscar was responsible for engineering websites at my company. I always found Oscar to be a reliable, intelligent and responsive. I have no hesitations in recommending Oscar and his work.

Oscar brought a great deal of technical expertise to the Flash book that we worked on together. He not only checked the accuracy of the authors' work, he also provided text and code suggestions that I know enhanced the book's quality. I would highly recommend hiring Oscar as a technical editor.

I met Oscar at SXSW and since then have done several consulting/contracting projects with Domani Studios. Oscar is very professional and extremely knowledgeable in his field. He has always been very responsive when questions arise and flexible and understanding during the course of a project. He is a great TD at Domani and an excellent person to work with.

author.title: Software Engineer (ex-Meta, ex-Amazon, Co-Founder of Viro, UpNext)
author.name: Vik Advani

testimonials.text: I'm happy to recommend Oscar. He's a strong technology head and was a great partner to me on a number of complex global projects. What I liked most about working with Oscar is that he always had the answer to the most difficult questions -- and when he didn't, he was completely without ego in terms of asking for help from his team or externally. Clients came to trust Oscar as a tech lead who helped them any number of issues that global marketers normally face -- such as hosting, site speed, version control -- just to name a few. He's patient with those who don't speak technology at his level -- both internally and client-side. A great technologist - I strongly recommend Oscar.

author.name: Mark Weintraub
author.title: Marketing and Agency Leader // Consultant // Growth Driver // C-level Problem Solver // Digital Transformations // Brand Positioning

testimonials.text: Oscar is fast, easy to work with and knows everything there is to know about flash / actionscript. I would reccomend him to anyone.

Oscar helped me bring a lot more clarity and structure to my business. From hundreds of ideas and paths, we managed to draft a plan that I am following confidently. The whole program was more than I imagined for sure. What I loved most in my coaching sessions with Oscar was his ability to consider my personal life and to make it as important as my business life and that for me is a law now.

I attended a Wim Hoff breathing class run by Oscar and it was a practice I used to do before. It was nice to come back to it and Oscar introduced the technique to the group in a professional way, with lots of information, insights and answered all the questions. It was a great class and I felt very relaxed and focused afterwards. I would recommend working with Oscar to anyone, he has a kind yet strong presence. Thanks again! 🙏 Best, Alex

I have been procrastinating for years on end to finally take the steps to run my own business and take control of my time. Oscar's program allowed me to unblock the barriers effortlessly while giving me the tools and skills needed to succeed.  I can't recommend his program enough. It is really life-changing. For years, I found myself stuck in a cycle of procrastination, always dreaming about running my own business but never taking the steps to make it happen. The idea of taking control of my time and building something of my own seemed so distant and daunting. It wasn't until I discovered Oscar's program that things started to change for me. Oscar's program was a game-changer. It effortlessly helped me break through the barriers that had held me back for so long. The strategies and insights provided were exactly what I needed to shift my mindset and take action. I learned practical tools and developed new skills that were crucial for my journey toward entrepreneurship. What stood out to me was how intuitive and effective the program was. It wasn't just about theory; it was about practical, actionable steps that made a real difference. Each session was designed to help me move forward with confidence, addressing my fears and uncertainties head-on. Now, looking back, I can't believe I waited so long to make this change. Oscar's program has been truly life-changing. It gave me the clarity and courage to pursue my dreams and the know-how to make them a reality. If you're even slightly considering taking the leap into running your own business, I can't recommend Oscar's program enough. It has transformed my life, and I'm confident it can do the same for you.

It was so nice experience! So relaxing and got to learn so many new tricks! Also, Oscar was so calm and nice, such good energy! The session was transformative and enabled a deep connection with myself. Amazing atmosphere! Thank you so so much.

Taking the decision to walk-away from what is known, such as your career history to-date, and to embark on a new direction to be aligned with your purpose is one of the hardest decisions. Perhaps you made the decision to move away from what you had been doing, but the how, when, and what needs to be done to bring to life what is aligned with your purpose and build it is unclear. As someone that served in leadership at different tech companies, building something from the bottom is familiar, but that was based on previous experience, a support group (your team), and the resources that as a company you could leverage. Once you’ve made the decision to be a solo-preneour this is no longer the case. You are now the CEO, the product, and everything else. Working with Oscar under his business program has taught and enabled me to look at the necessary stages for building something new from a macro level, zooming in as we moved forward. He has a research mindset that helped my projects come to life aided with insights, and a direction for a short and long term vision. What resonated the most was his continuous assessment of my energy levels at each stage to surface any personal potential blockers that could be impacting the progress. Having a coach that understands the importance of personal well-being was a must for me. He kept me motivated, accountable for the progress of my projects, and infused confidence for the direction I took on. Clarity for what’s next continued to build up from day one. It was all essential to bringing the new projects I now have ready to offer to the world. I would highly recommend it specially to anyone like me, who had a long career and now has found what fuels their passion and wants to embrace it full on leveraging what’s possible from their previous work life.

My experience with Oscar’s breathwork workshop was a really deep experience. For me, it didn’t take a long time to get somewhere totally with it. Really powerful breathwork and he is really amazing facilitator for it. 100% will recommend his breathwork. Thank you Oscar🙏🏽✨
Oscar was very knowledgable and a great guide throughout the workshop and the venue was amazing.

I was at a low point in my life when I came across Oscar’s program. I've been working for companies with a rather depressing corporate culture for years. Identifying myself as someone with a creative spirit, my job is very much at odds with my underlying values. I'm deeply troubled by it. Being laid off was a surprise, but at the same time I am determined not to rush to another soulless job that will never make me feel fulfilled. Doing what I love and working for myself has always been my dream but I'm not yet fully established in my next goal. Oscar is a very patient listener. He is able to hit the nail on the head with just a few words, the sharpest ones. Since we started the program, my friend and I partnered up and started organising our project, it's our passion and it iterated fast: setting up the workspace, deciding on the brand name, designing the logo and setting up our first event. There were a few blocks on the way, more precisely, it was the unresolved blockages from the past that were blocking my energy. Through let go meditation with Oscar, I was able to slowly heal myself and move forward with the project with more confidence. I would 100% recommend this program to anyone. There is a reason the program is set up for 10 sessions, it was only around the 7th session that I built up enough trust to speak up about the deep emotional blockages that were holding me back. After that there were still a lot of back and forth, but every time I think back to how I felt and how i was guided in that session, the energy came back and I was able to focus again. Above everything, I regained my trust in human-beings, which is priceless. Thank you Oscar!

Oscar has been an incredible mentor and former manager. He didn’t just teach me the skills to become a successful sales professional; he showed me entirely new ways to think and approach challenges in business. Oscar provides unique angles to look at things, yet always find a solution. What I learned from him—about running a business, building a network, and knowing when to pivot—are skills I will carry with me for life. Beyond being a mentor, Oscar is a lifelong friend, always there with advice and inspiration. I am grateful for his guidance and friendship.

Oscar's support helped me confront a dire medical diagnosis and enabled me, among other things, to commence treatment with hope. Oscar's empathy and coaching sessions cultivated a resilient attitude within me. I am thankful for this experience with Oscar; his ability to provide perspective is an invaluable tool for the challenge I am facing. Thanks to Oscar's wonderful support, I am fully aware that, in addition to medication, my recovery depends on my positive attitude and my mind sending the right messages to my body. I wholeheartedly recommend Oscar's work and am confident that many others will be helped as effectively by him as I have been.

This journey has truly been transformative. In just 10 weeks, I've undergone a profound evolution that I never thought possible. Oscar played a pivotal role in guiding me through this process, helping me confront and release the internal obstacles that were holding me back. With his support, I was able to clear out the clutter and gain the mental clarity needed to start piecing together the puzzle of my life—both personally and professionally. What began as a simple desire for change has blossomed into a comprehensive restructuring of my mindset and approach to life. If you're ready to unlock your potential and embark on a transformative experience, Oscar is the guide you need by your side.

It was absolutely amazing! Since years I’m trying to meditate in the morning but often I’m too tired so I do it later in the day but now as I know this breathing technique I can start the day full of energy and focus. Oscar is a great mentor, he explained first everything, answered questions and then starter the main part. And he couldn’t have done it any better! Absolutely join the next one. 😁 Thank you Oscar!

I was feeling somewhat lost and disconnected from my creative potential. His compassionate and non-judgmental approach helped me shift my perspective. Instead of pushing for drastic changes, Oscar guided me to celebrate my journey so far and recognise the existing abundance in my life and in myself, a meaningful reframing that I am very grateful for. Thank you Oscar!

I’ve been curious about exploring breathwork for a while now, but I had never attended a proper workshop before, so most of the techniques were new to me. What truly amazed me was how impactful a 20-minute breathwork exercise could be. With Oscar’s supportive guidance, I was able to achieve a profound sense of relaxation and calm. The physical and mental shift I experienced before and after the session was both significant and noticeable. Since attending the workshop, I’ve become much more mindful of my breathing in everyday moments. I’ve also found that practicing deep breathing at night has been especially helpful in winding down before bed. It was also lovely meeting new people as the group was small and intimate. Thank you Oscar for a wonderful and uplifting session 🤗

I completed an absolutely transformative 10 weeks of systemic coaching with Oscar. In the time spent in the program, which coincided with the beginning of full-time entrepreneurship for me, I developed and grew my Intuition-Based Human Design business, signed five new clients in one week, launched a podcast on spirituality and created a community of readers for a creative newsletter. I was initially daunted by the prospect of creating a business - but working with Oscar has helped me to increase my confidence significantly. It was a wonderful balance of deep soul work and practical business advice and guidance clearly backed up with years of experience. I feel motivated and encouraged, considerably more resilient than I was before starting "Unblocked in 10 Weeks".
What a great workshop. Oscar is a fantastic Wim Hof Method instructor. Knowledgeable, authentic, full of positive energy. 100% recommended.

Working with Oscar has been a transformative experience for me and my business. Through his guidance, I’ve gained much more clarity around my business vision and defined my target audience with greater precision. His support has also been instrumental in helping me believe more in myself and my capabilities. What I value the most is how Oscar helped me unlock internal blocks that were holding me back. As a result, I’m now able to live out my potential more fully and confidently. His coaching has truly empowered me, both personally and professionally, and for that, I’m incredibly grateful.

seoDefaults.metaDescription: Perform at your best. Live with clarity. Transform your life through breathwork, mindfulness, and transformative experiences.
